comprehensive_overview: The ARM GNU Toolchain is a collection of tools/libraries used to create applications for embedded ARM processors. It includes the GNU Compiler Collection (GCC) for compiling C/C++ code, GNU Binutils for creating/executing binary files, and GDB for debugging.
core_features: Support for compiling C/C++ code for ARM processors
Highly optimized code generation for embedded systems
Open-source tools with strong community support
